relation: Great for these types of students
Really safe, they have their police deptm
Students who want to learn and really experience college
There are a lot of clubs you could join or simply hang out in the recreational areas or the cafeteria.
Their food is really good, but it's expensive liek everywhere.
They have really good teachers in every apartment, even in dance or exercise.
If you want to be in a school that really cares about you, choose Grossmont.

Grossmont College it's a very good school, I love everything about it. They have great teachers, so they have a good academic level. one of the things I love the most it's how all the teachers have great relationships.
pageTitle: Grossmont College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {198474=Grossmonts academic rigor is not as challenging as many Colleges. One thing grossmont knows is that many students are coming from high school, which means they are not used to hard work. Grammar is not a big deal, engagement is not a must, an most difficult classes allow curves which help out on transcripts but not as a student., 84561=the food and dining has changed a lot since i first started. i started school at grossmont college in the fall of 2005. things were not as they are now. they have recently remodeled and constructed a new cafeteria. but more than that, they have created a student center where students are able to go get food and still study. this new student center allows students in the food court to feel like they are home., 70371=As an out of state student tuition is of course a bit more expensive for me; however, I really can not complain. As a Veteran I will pay close to $2500 out of my pocket for 12 credit hours. I feel satisfied with the cost especially with the new campus being built., 262134=For only $1500 a semester, this is an amazing institution to start off at. The professors here are just as good at San Diego State and other big campuses, and a lot of the time work at different universities as well., 501810=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students register for your classes as soon as registration opens classes go really fast Am learning a lot certain teacher will teach you more than you expect and then there are some that are just there to be funny . Login to rate or flag the reviews Guillermo from Santee, CA 02/09/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 130 Categories Comments Campus Safety there is a lot of security in this school they have a police department and are there to help Clubs and Activities there are many activities and clubs you can join i haven't enrolled in any because of my busy schedule. hopefully soon i will Great for these types of students students who want to succeed What
